name: 施陽正
objective: 本科目將由不可壓縮流體在各種流動環境所產生之流體分子流動現象之認識，進而利用各種有關因次群，熟習包含可壓縮流體在內之實際應用上所必須具備之基礎方法；如雷諾數．伯努力方程式等。利用流利基礎分析，流體機械之流場與動力，及管路內流場與壓力之變化。
schedule:
週次                    進度
1 　　Course Outline & Introduction to Fluid Mechanics
2 　　Fluid Statics, I
3 　　Fluid Statics, II
4 　　Elementary Fluid Dynamics---The Bernoulli Equation, I
5        Elementary Fluid Dynamics---The Bernoulli Equation, II
6        Elementary Fluid Dynamics---The Bernoulli Equation, III
7        Mid-term Exam, I & Fluid Kinematics
8 　　Finite Control Volume Analysis, I
9 　　Finite Control Volume Analysis, II
10 　　Finite Control Volume Analysis, III
11       Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow, I
12       Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow, II
13       Mid-term Exam, II & Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow, III
14       Similitude, Dimensional Analysis, and Modeling
15       Viscous Flow in Pipes, I
16　　Viscous Flow in Pipes, II
17       Flow Over Immersed Body
18       Final Exam
materials:

Fox, R.W., Pritchard, P.J. and McDonald, A.T., “Introduction to Fluid Mechanics”, 7th ed., 2010.

3. Mott, R.L., “Applied Fluid Mechanics”, 5th Edition, 2000.
